short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free chrome extension that helps you to spot Indian products easily online on shopping websites like flipkart etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Know what are you buying, this extension helps you identify Indian products easily. On flipkart the Indian products become green with a verified tick mark. Different colors for products from different countries and the color are so subtle that they dont interfere with user experience. 
Install the extension by clicking add to chrome button
Easily notice the difference between Indian products and other products on flipkart.
Support for Amazon comming soon.
